snippet.title: VOICE ACTOR REVEAL | Kill/ Cure: Beautiful Vice
snippet.description:
Kill/ Cure: Beautiful Vice will release its prologue on March 22nd!
We hope you enjoyed our Voice Actor Showcase.

--------------------------------------------------------------------

[ PROLOGUE PLAYTHROUGH PREMIERE ]
https://youtu.be/slvcb5aljIM

--------------------------------------------------------------------

[ SOCIALS ]
TWITTER - https://twitter.com/TeamKillCure
INSTAGRAM - https://www.instagram.com/teamkillcure/
TUMBLR - https://teamkillcure.tumblr.com
DISCORD - https://discord.gg/JuEcys7
TIK TOK - https://www.tiktok.com/@teamkillcure
BLUESKY - https://bsky.app/profile/teamkillcure.bsky.social

--------------------------------------------------------------------

[ VIDEO CREDITS ]
Video Editing - Andrew (https://andrewmoers.carrd.co/)

VA: Kokorosaru - Madison Lee (https://www.imdb.com/name/nm9809135/)
VA: Hiroaki Uzuki - Ren Vero (https://x.com/RenVeroVO)
VA: Bussho Saji - Eve (No Link)
VA: Chikuma Konishi - Hannah Magers (https://x.com/HannahMMagers)
VA: Fan Fan Long - Lizz Robinett (https://www.youtube.com/LizzRobinett)
VA: Hide Osako - Caitlin Myers (https://www.youtube.com/user/MOM0KI)

VA: Naiomi Danjuma - Empress Layla (https://linktr.ee/Empresslayla)

VA: Shoko Otaki - Shay-Ki Fullalove (https://x.com/TheShakyShaky)
VA: Toya Imamura - Artimmiss (https://twitter.com/MoriArtiVT)
VA: Uta Kawagichi - Natepeach (https://twitter.com/natepeach)
VA: Yahto Stone Crown - Juwan Royal (https://x.com/ItsJRoyal)
VA: Shiori Nakagawa - Adoxographist (https://twitter.com/AdoxTalks)
VA: Bizarrosaru - Maganda Marie (https://x.com/MagandaMarieVA)

Music & Mixing - MichaelOST (https://www.youtube.com/@michaelostmusic/)
Video Concept & Graphics & Editing & Art & Animation & Directing & Thumbnail - Schlen (https://twitter.com/_schlen_)
Video Concept & Art & Thumbnail - Liam (https://twitter.com/imleeham)
Thumbnail - Funtime (https://twitter.com/TheOnlyFuntime)
Thumbnail - Pine (https://www.instagram.com/pinecone.pal)
Art - Scalvy (https://twitter.com/Scalvy_art)
Art - Kurokkutokei (https://ktokei.tumblr.com/)
Art - Momo (https://twitter.com/M0M0SAURUS)
Art - Djcat (https://djcat-meow.carrd.co/)
Art - Cinna (https://twitter.com/CinnaBoop1)
Art - Kiilmart (https://www.instagram.com/kiilmart/)
Animation - Stan (https://twitter.com/stanishi_)
Animation - DanganFran (https://twitter.com/DanganFran)
Animation - KHeartz (https://twitter.com/KHeartzTV)
Animation - Luna0789 (https://x.com/Mendz234)

Project related credits (For sprites etc.) can be found on our discord!

--------------------------------------------------------------------

We are a nonprofit fanmade project inspired by the Danganronpa franchise.
As we are not associated with Spike Chunsoft, we can only ask you to support the official series!
https://store.steampowered.com/bundle/13789/Danganronpa_12V3/
